akn:section.akn:heading: Pipeline facilities hazardous to life and property

(b) In making a decision under subsection (a) of this section, the Secretary shall consider, if relevant—

(c) The Secretary shall provide, to any appropriate official of a State in which a pipeline facility is located and about which a proceeding has begun under this section, notice and an opportunity to comment on an agreement the Secretary proposes to make to resolve the proceeding. State comment shall incorporate comments of affected local officials.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Waiver of Notice and Hearing in Emergency.—

akn:content.akn:p: (e) The Secretary may waive the requirements for notice and an opportunity for a hearing under this section and issue expeditiously an order under this section if the Secretary decides failure to issue the order expeditiously will result in likely serious harm to life, property, or the environment. An order under this subsection shall provide an opportunity for a hearing as soon as practicable after the order is issued.
